name: SBT
description: Manual check required

name: Sanoma
description: Sanoma is an innovative and agile learning and media company that impacts the lives of millions of people every day through its Learning and Media products.

name: Sinclair Broadcast Group
description: Sinclair Broadcast Group, Inc. is a diversified media company and a leading provider of local news and sports.

name: Servus TV
description: Servus TV is a media company that provides information about its television programming, including missed shows available in the Servus TV On Mediathek and current live streaming options.

name: SES Global
description: SES Global is a leader in global content connectivity solutions, recognized as the world's only multi-orbit satellite player. The company specializes in providing reliable and secure satellite and ground communications solutions, aiming to connect more people in more places with content that educates, entertains, and drives business forward. SES focuses on generating sustained and profitable growth by offering a comprehensive suite of end-to-end solutions tailored to market demands. With a commitment to pushing breakthroughs in connectivity, SES enriches lives and empowers personal stories, making significant impacts on communities worldwide.

name: Saudi Telecom Company (STC, Jawwy)
description: Saudi Telecom Company (STC) offers a range of telecommunications services in Saudi Arabia, including high-speed internet and reliable mobile plans for both home and personal use. The company is known for its commitment to providing advanced digital solutions and connectivity options, catering to the needs of its customers in the telecommunications sector.

name: Sentech
description: Sentech is a leading developer and manufacturer of low-damage plasma process systems and thin film metrology tools specifically designed for the semiconductor industry, based in Berlin-Adlershoff. The company focuses on providing advanced solutions in thin film metrology and plasma processing, catering to the needs of the semiconductor sector.

name: SBS Television
description: SBS Television is Australia’s most diverse media network, operating six television channels and over 60 radio services, along with SBS On Demand. The network offers a wide range of multi-lingual content, including news, audio, television, video streaming, sports, and food, aimed at keeping audiences informed and entertained.

name: SIC
description: SIC is associated with the Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) Manual, which categorizes various industries, including Division A: Agriculture, Forestry, and Fishing. The official site for SIC is osha.gov, where users can access data related to the classification system.

name: Setar
description: SETAR NV is a leading technology, media, and telecommunications provider based in Aruba, offering a comprehensive range of services including advanced mobile connectivity, high-speed Internet, digital television, and fixed telephony for both residential and business customers. The company prides itself on delivering the highest Internet speeds on the island and facilitating seamless connections for users, whether they are on the island or traveling abroad. SETAR's digital television service features up to 200 premium HD and audio channels, while its business solutions are designed to enhance operational efficiency for local enterprises. Committed to continuous innovation, SETAR aims to meet the evolving needs of the Aruban community through its diverse service offerings.

name: Saeta TV (Canal 10)
description: Saeta TV, also known as Canal 10, is a Uruguayan television channel that offers 24-hour live broadcasting. The channel features a variety of content, including complete programs, series, exclusive videos, and news segments from Subrayado.

name: SFR
description: SFR is a telecommunications company that offers a range of services including mobile plans, high-speed internet through fiber optics, and security solutions for homes. The company provides various mobile subscription options tailored for different user needs, including international plans and family data sharing through SFR Multi. SFR also partners with Europ Assistance to offer comprehensive home security packages, which include professional monitoring and customizable alert systems. The company features a wide selection of smartphones, including the latest models from Apple and Samsung, and provides trade-in options for customers looking to upgrade their devices.

name: Seven Network
description: Seven West Media (ASX: SWM) is one of Australia’s most prominent integrated media companies, reaching over 19 million people monthly with a leading presence in content production across broadcast television, publishing, and digital platforms.

name: Singtel
description: Singtel is Asia's leading communications group, providing a diverse range of services that include fixed and mobile telecommunications, data, internet, television, infocomm technology (ICT), and digital solutions.

name: Sigma
description: Sigma is a Japanese manufacturer of photographic lenses and cameras, founded by Michihiro Yamaki in 1961 and currently managed by his son, Kazuto Yamaki. The company is headquartered in Kanagawa, with its sole manufacturing facility located in Aizu, Fukushima, where all production processes, including optical engineering and quality control, are conducted entirely in Japan. Sigma emphasizes craftsmanship and innovation, aiming to provide photographers and filmmakers with high-quality tools to express their creative visions. The company has been a family-owned business for over sixty years and maintains strong ties to the Tohoku region, contributing to local culture and technology. Sigma's commitment to quality and diversity is reflected in its expanding global sales and service network.

name: Sekom Iletisim sistemleri
description: Sekom Iletisim Sistemleri, founded in 1992 and headquartered in Ankara, is a prominent digital transformation integrator specializing in networking solutions, broadcasting, unified communications, data center services, and emerging technologies. With a workforce of over 130 experts, Sekom serves various markets, including public, defense, corporate, and service providers, offering consultancy, project management, and operational support. The company has evolved through several phases, from its initial focus on communication technologies to becoming a comprehensive systems integrator and software and security company. Sekom has established strategic partnerships, notably with Soitron, a leading system integrator in Central and Eastern Europe, enhancing its capabilities in services, product development, and expertise. The company has achieved significant milestones, including being recognized among the 50 fastest growing technology companies by Deloitte and reaching a turnover exceeding 40 million USD in 2013.

name: Samaa TV
description: Manual check required

name: Siemens
description: Siemens AG is a global technology leader headquartered in Munich, focused on driving innovation across various industries, including industry, infrastructure, transport, and healthcare, through cutting-edge solutions and technologies.

name: Silknet
description: Silknet is a telecommunications company that offers a range of services including home internet, mobile services, and digital television through its SilkTV platform. The company provides various internet packages, including optical and DSL internet, as well as mobile internet and international calling services. Silknet also features additional services such as virtual private networks (VPN), online payment options, and customer support through service centers. The company is known for its competitive offerings in the Georgian market, including special promotions and bundled packages that combine internet and television services.

name: Saudi Broadcasting Authority (SBA)
description: The Saudi Broadcasting Authority (SBA) is a governmental entity in Saudi Arabia that operates with legal personality and financial independence, reporting to the Minister of Media. Its mission is to convey the message of Saudi Arabia locally and globally through high-quality audio-visual content, enhancing the performance of radio and television. The SBA oversees several television channels, including Saudi Channel, SBC, and Al Ekhbariya, as well as various radio and digital platforms such as Quran Radio and Radio Jeddah. The organization aims to be a leading media system in producing reliable, innovative, and high-quality content, focusing on education, information, and entertainment.
